title: The Indochina and Vietnam Wars - Collection 3
description:
The Indochina and Vietnam Wars - Collection 3:

We have 35 titles here:

- Ahern - Vietnam Declassified; the CIA and Counterinsurgency (2010)

-  Brinkley - Cambodia's Curse; the Modern History of a Troubled Land (2011)

-  Burr & Kimball - Nixon's Nuclear Specter; the Secret Alert of 1969, Madman Diplomacy, and the Vietnam War (2015)

-  Carter - Inventing Vietnam; the United States and State Building, 1954-1968 (2008)

-  Chomsky & Herman - After the Cataclysm; Postwar Indochina & the Reconstruction of Imperial Ideology (1979)

-  Clymer - The United States and Cambodia, 1870-1969; from Curiosity to Confrontation (2004)

-  Clymer - The United States and Cambodia, 1969-2000; a Troubled Relationship (2004)

-  Croizat (Trans.) - A Translation from the French Lessons of the War in Indochina, Vol. 2 (1967)

-  Daddis - No Sure Victory; Measuring U.S. Army Effectiveness and Progress in the Vietnam War (2011)

-  Dufresne - The First Indochina War and the Failure of the European Defense Community, 1950-1954, a MA Thesis (2006)

-  Engelman - Tears before the Rain; an Oral History of the Fall of South Vietnam (1990)

-  Gale - Vietnam War Reference Library Volume 1 - Biographies (2001)

-  Gale - Vietnam War Reference Library Volume 2 - Biographies (2001)

-  Gale - Vietnam War Reference Library Volume 3 - Almanac (2001)

-  Gale - Vietnam War Reference Library Volume 4 - Primary Sources (2001)

-  Gillam - Life and Death in the Central Highlands; an American Sergeant in the Vietnam War, 1968-1970 (2010)

-  Glasser - Broken Bodies, Shattered Minds; a Medical Odyssey from Vietnam to Afghanistan (2011)

-  Hay (Ed.) - The Greenhaven Encyclopedia of the Vietnam War (2004)

-  Hildebrand & Porter - Cambodia; Starvation and Revolution (1976)

-  Jian - China and the First Indochina War, 1950-54, The China Quarterly, No. 133 (March, 1993)

-  Jian - China's Involvement in the Vietnam War, 1964-69, The China Quarterly, N. 142 (June, 1995)

-  Kent - The Vietnam War from Da Nang to Saigon (2011)

-  Ketwig - ... and a Hard Rain Fell; a GI;s True Story of the War in Vietnam (2008)

-  Lembcke - The Spitting Image; Myth, Memory and The Legacy of Vietnam (1998)

-  Mangold & Penycate - The Tunnels of Cu Chi; a Harrowing Account of America's Tunnel Rats in the Underground Battlefields of Vietnam (1985)

-  Moyar - Triumph Forsaken; the Vietnam War, 1954-1965 (2006)

-  Race - The Origins of the Second Indochina War (1970)

-  Rottman - Viet Cong and NVA Tunnels and Fortifications of the Vietnam War (2006)

-  Russell - War Crimes in Vietnam (1967)

-  Schulzinger - A Time for Peace; the Legacy of the Vietnam War (2006)

-  Scurfield - A Vietnam Trilogy; Veterans and Post Traumatic Stress; 1968, 1989, 2000 (2004)

-  Shay - Achilles in Vietnam; Combat Trauma and the Undoing of Character (1994)

-  Steinberg - Shame and Humiliation; Presidential Decision Making on Vietnam (1996)

-  Tran - The Vietnam War and Theologies of Memory; Time and Eternity in the Far Country (2010)

-  Ung - First They Killed My Father; a Daughter of Cambodia Remembers (2000)
